These are all real, coherent sentences, spoken by an English speaker. That choice of speaker might be inappropriate...
Each sentence is in a different language, and each one is read as if it were written with English phonetics.
The languages in this puzzle are, in order, Thai, Tagalog, Tamil, Estonian, Mandarin, Spanish, Swedish, Italian, and German.
Try answering the questions in the order they're given and in the language in which they were posed.
